---

Key Features:

1. Instant URL Copying: A "Copy Link" button appears over each Unsplash image, allowing you to instantly copy the image URL to your clipboard.

2. Customizable URLs: Click on the extension icon to set default parameters like width, height, quality, and more using the imgix Rendering API.

3. Download with Parameters: Easily download images with your specified parameters directly to your device.

4. Profile Management for Parameters: Save up to 10 custom profiles with your favorite settings (e.g., width, height, quality, etc.). Load a saved profile to automatically populate the fields, making repetitive tasks even faster!

5. Custom Query Support: Include any additional imgix query parameters in your URL, giving you complete control over image transformations.

6. Profile Selector: Easily switch between saved profiles using a dropdown menu for seamless customization.

---

How It Works:

1. Copy Image URL: Hover over any Unsplash image and click the "Copy Link" button to copy the direct URL.

2. Customize URL: Use the extension popup to set your preferred parameters (width, height, quality, etc.) or load a saved profile.

3. Download Image: Click the "Download Image" button to save the image with your custom settings.

4. Save and Load Profiles: Save your frequently used settings with custom profile names and load them on demand.

---
